definition[0]: if someone or something is out of harm’s way, they are in a place where they cannot be hurt or damaged
example[0]: Copies of your documents should be kept in a safe place, well out of harm’s way.
definition[1]: if something dangerous is out of harm’s way, it is in a place where it cannot hurt anyone or damage anything
example[1]: If you have small children, make sure that you store all medicines out of harm’s way.
